bibl.title: Greco-Roman Perspectives on Friendship
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 69 (1997), Bibl. Beilage 4, p. 145.
bibl.seg: EVANS Katherine G., Friendship in the Greek Documentary Papyri and Inscriptions: A Survey.
